participant_1.background:
I want to live in a place where I can have more privacy and space to train my dragon.
i exercise everyday.
my sister is a guitarist.
I enjoy learning new recipes to adapt to my dietary restrictions.
i m gay but i haven t told my parents yet.

participant_2.background:
I used to be afraid to speak my mind, but now I am more confident in expressing my opinions.
i sometimes need to scream to feel alive.
i know how to play the guitar.
i have a passion for politics.
I cherish the time I spend with my loved ones.

content.text: Hey not much just vibin. Whats up with you
Same here. How long have you been playing guitar?
Oh cool. My sister plays as well. I'm gay but haven't told my parents yet
I used to be scared to speak my mind but now I'm more confident in expressing my opinions. What are your dietary restrictions?
I have celiac disease so I can't eat gluten. It's a pain but I'm used to it by now
Oh wow that must be tough. I know how you feel though, I have a passion for politics but I'm afraid to share my opinions with my family
That's understandable. It's hard to be open minded with family sometimes
I know right. But I'm trying to be more confident in expressing myself
That's good to hear. I'm proud of you
